name: Be Bold!
description:
Be Bold! is a runner game with shooting mechanics. 
Roll, jump and shoot till you reach the end!
If the game is going too fast for you, you can always slow it down with bullet time.
You can regain the energy used in bullet time by picking up energy spheres

This game was made for a school project. This version feature some improvements over the one we released at the end of the class.

This game has two versions, an HTML one and an executable one.
They both feature the same gameplay, but the executable possesses better graphics with a neon shader and a audiovisualizer in the background.

Controls:
Jump - Space 
Shoot - Left Click
Bullet Time - Right Click
Pause - Escape
